messages.text: Lets start with structure. Weve got ops in 4 regions and a centralized CX team. Each group has different needs, but execs want unified reporting.
Got it. Sounds like were looking at multi-org support with layered permissions. Do your regions currently operate on separate systems?
Yeah, legacy tools for most plus a lot of spreadsheets. Thats part of the problem. We want to avoid another siloed solution.
Makes sense. Weve done similar unification for UPS East and LATAM Logistics. Would it help if I showed you a demo dashboard customized for a multi-region setup?
Yes, but dont go full pitch mode yet :smile: were still gathering landscape options. A screenshot or short loom could work.
Haha fair. Ill keep it light. Just dropped a 90-second loom in here: http://loom.com/demo-fdx-crm - loom.com/demo-fdx-crm, Let me know your thoughts or where you want to dig deeper.
This is solid. Ill loop in Priya IT later to ask about APIs and auth. Timeline-wise, were evaluating vendors through August no rush, just keeping this moving.
Totally understand. Ill keep sharing value and stay in your orbit. Let me know if/when you want to explore pricing models or POC scope.
Will do. Appreciate the no-pressure vibe.
Deals off, priya said no, for any concerns to contact them.

summary: The prospect, initially seeking a unified reporting solution for multi-regional operations, received a loom demo and was in an early evaluation phase with an August timeline. However, the prospect later informed the sales rep that the deal is off due to a negative internal stakeholder decision (Priya IT).
